alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 11 at 3:09AM CST until January 11 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter to one half mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Carlton and South St. Louis and Pine Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Fond du Lac Band and the Mille Lacs Band, Lena Lake and, Hinckley areas. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing fog may result in some slippery patches on roadways, especially on elevated surfaces such as bridges and overpasses. The lowest visibilities will be most likely in the higher terrain areas. Lower elevations in the Twin Ports are not expected to see widespread dense fog
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
